Headline: Orange Line Trains Delay near Midway
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing with delays near the area of Midway due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing with delays near the area of Midway due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
